title: Mahu Vice
description: Months have passed since Honolulu homicide detective Kimo Kanapa’aka walked away from the blaze at Wa’ahila State Park—and from his partner Mike. Now, Kimo and Mike must work together to solve an arson-homicide while attempting to mend their relationship. Neil S. Plakcy is the author of the Mahu series.
author: Neil S. Plakcy
